name: Maya Torres
core_wound: Grew up in Level 8 with Nico, managed to escape to Level 6 through education, feels survivor's guilt for leaving people behind
wants: To fix the system through proper channels, to save Nico specifically
needs: To realize the system can't be fixed from within, that sometimes rules must be broken
voice_markers: Speaks carefully, formally - worked hard to lose her lower-tier accent
Uses social work jargon as armor
contradiction: Believes in the system while working with people the system has abandoned; wants to help but constrained by regulations that prevent real help
physical_description: Latina, professional appearance, carries exhaustion in her posture, kind eyes that have seen too much, maintains appearance carefully as armor against tier prejudice
skills: Social work training - crisis intervention, resource navigation
flaws: Rigid adherence to rules even when they don't work
Judgmental of people still using drugs (defense mechanism)
Workaholic to avoid processing her own trauma
Tendency to try to 'fix' people rather than listen
knowledge_state_book1_start: Both lower tier culture and mid-tier professional culture

relationships.Nico Chen: Former close friend, maybe more before his addiction spiraled, now her most difficult client, mix of frustration and hope
relationships.Kade Rivera: Dislikes him, sees him as enabler keeping Nico trapped
relationships.Level 6 colleagues: Never fully accepted, they see her lower-tier origins
